hero.title: Professional Moving Services You Can Trust
hero.subtitle: Your reliable partner for local and long-distance moves. We handle your belongings with care and precision.
hero.description: We handle your belongings with care and precision. From local moves to long-distance relocations, we make your moving experience stress-free and efficient.

about.title: About Us
about.storyContent: Prime Moving was founded with a vision to simplify the moving process. With years of experience, we’ve helped thousands of families and businesses relocate with ease.
about.impactContent: We’ve served over 1000 happy customers, providing reliable and efficient moving services across the country, with a focus on sustainability and community support.
about.missionContent: Our mission is to deliver stress-free moving experiences through exceptional service, transparency, and care for our customers’ belongings.

whyUs.title: Why Choose Us
whyUs.licensedDesc: We are fully licensed and insured, giving you peace of mind during your move.
whyUs.experiencedDesc: Our team consists of trained professionals with years of moving experience.
whyUs.transparentDesc: No hidden fees. We provide clear, upfront pricing for all our services.
whyUs.ctaDesc: Get started with a free quote and experience a seamless move with Prime Moving.

services.title: Our Services
services.residentialDesc: We offer comprehensive residential moving services to make your home relocation smooth and stress-free.
services.commercialDesc: Our commercial moving services ensure your business relocates efficiently with minimal downtime.
services.packingDesc: Let us handle the packing with our professional packing services, ensuring your items are safe and secure.

quote.title: Get Your Free Quote
quote.description: Fill out the form below to get a free, no-obligation quote for your move.
quote.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your moving needs...
quote.note: * Only your name is required. We'll contact you to gather additional details.
quote.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

modal.message: Your quote request has been submitted successfully. We'll get back to you soon!

footer.tagline: Prime Moving – Your trusted partner for stress-free moves.
